code: import{useEffect}from"react";import{useLocation,useNavigate}from"react-router-dom";import{getUserPresp}from"./useIdentity";var useAuth=function useAuth(){var nav=useNavigate();var loc=useLocation();useEffect(function(){checkAuthentified();},[loc.pathname]);var checkAuthentified=function checkAuthentified(){var user=getUserPresp();if(user===undefined)nav("/sign");};return{};};export default useAuth;
